title: [Dynamic Regions] multiple rocksdb tikv panic with Option::unwrap() on a None value
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

master

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->
```
[2023/02/28 21:54:06.543 +00:00] [FATAL] [[lib.rs:497](http://lib.rs:497/)] ["called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value"] [backtrace="   0: tikv_util::set_panic_hook::{{closure}}
             at /home/jenkins/agent/workspace/build-common/go/src/[github.com/pingcap/tikv/components/tikv_util/src/lib.rs:496:18
](http://github.com/pingcap/tikv/components/tikv_util/src/lib.rs:496:18/n)   1: <alloc::boxed::Box<F,A> as core::ops::function::Fn<Args>>::call
             at /rust/toolchains/nightly-2022-11-15-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/alloc/src/[boxed.rs:2032](http://boxed.rs:2032/):9
      std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook
             at /rust/toolchains/nightly-2022-11-15-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/[panicking.rs:692](http://panicking.rs:692/):13

   4: rust_begin_unwind
             at /rust/toolchains/nightly-2022-11-15-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/[panicking.rs:575](http://panicking.rs:575/):5

](http://github.com/pingcap/tikv/components/raftstore-v2/src/fsm/apply.rs:73:21/n)      raftstore_v2::operation::command::<impl raftstore_v2::raft::peer::Peer<EK,ER>>::schedule_apply_fsm

](http://github.com/pingcap/tikv/components/raftstore-v2/src/operation/command/mod.rs:125:48/n)   8: raftstore_v2::operation::ready::snapshot::<impl raftstore_v2::raft::peer::Peer<EK,ER>>::on_applied_snapshot

"] [location=/home/jenkins/agent/workspace/build-common/go/src/[github.com/pingcap/tikv/components/raftstore-v2/src/raft/apply.rs:77](http://github.com/pingcap/tikv/components/raftstore-v2/src/raft/apply.rs:77)]
```

### What did you expect?

### What did happened?
